messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Betrace. May I have your name, please?
Hi Betrace, my name is Emma.
Nice to meet you, Emma. How can I assist you today?
I'm really disappointed with the Purina Pro Plan product. My dog has been having health issues since I started feeding it to him. Can you help me understand what's going on?
I'm very sorry to hear that, Emma. Can you please provide me with more details about the health issues your dog is experiencing?
He's been vomiting and has had diarrhea ever since we switched to Purina Pro Plan. I thought it was supposed to be a high-quality product.
I understand your concern, Emma. Can you tell me which specific variety of Purina Pro Plan you are using?
I bought the Purina Pro Plan Savor Adult Shredded Blend Chicken & Rice Formula.
Thank you for providing that information. Have you consulted with your veterinarian about these health issues?
Yes, I have. The vet suggested it might be the food causing these problems. That's why I'm so frustrated.

I understand your frustration, Emma. We take such concerns very seriously. I can report this issue to our quality assurance team and see what can be done. In the meantime, I would recommend discontinuing the use of this product and following your vet's advice.
I've already stopped feeding it to him, but I really need to know if there's something wrong with this product.
I assure you that we will investigate this issue thoroughly. Could you please provide me with the batch number and expiration date from the bag?
Sure, the batch number is 123456 and the expiration date is June 2024.
Thank you, Emma. I will escalate this issue to our quality control team immediately. You should hear back from us within the next few days. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all for now. I just hope this gets resolved quickly.
We will do our best, Emma. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we appreciate your patience.
You're welcome, Emma. Have a good day.
